description: This Dart source file defines the RatingsProvider class, which manages stock ratings based on market data. It extends ChangeNotifier to allow reactive updates within a Flutter application and interacts with MarketProvider to retrieve market quotes and generate stock ratings.

classes.name: RatingsProvider
classes.description: A provider class extending ChangeNotifier that supplies stock ratings based on market quotes, allowing UI components to reactively update when data changes.

methods.name: ratingFor
methods.description: Returns a StockRating object for a given stock symbol, using mock data if the market quotes are unavailable.

methods.name: allRatings
methods.description: Returns a list of StockRating objects for all available stock quotes in the market.
